channel.title: Cockroach Of The Month AWARDS!
channel.description:
Only dev / mods are allowed to post and award a chosen cockroach (new comer to the forums = cockroach status symbol) so this is why the thread is closed. Each month a new cockroach will be chosen by a member of the dev / mod team and will be announced in this here thread. While there is no "prize" at this time (perhaps in future there will be?) this is still concidered an honored status and all should congratulate the winner with pats on the back and pm's of praise.
Our first honored cockroach is... (drumroll)
o herrow![/SIZE] Cockroach Join Date: 15th March, 2010 Posts: 11
Honored in the category of: "[url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showpost.php?p=183807&postcount=7192']Outstanding observations[/url]"
